name: Ledger Dark
description: Financial terminal - Blade Runner corporate tech, night shift data analysis

character.short: Green phosphor screens in dim offices. Money flows as particle streams.
character.extended: INSTRUMENT + SIGNAL: Late capitalism's control room. Finding pattern in the endless stream. The night shift analyst watching transactions flow like weather systems. Terminal warmth in corporate cold.
character.mood: Focused vigilance. Pattern recognition trance. The satisfaction of signal emerging from noise.

expression.INSTRUMENT: The terminal itself. Dashboard as control surface. Dense data displays.
expression.SIGNAL: Spending patterns emerging from transaction noise. CRT aesthetic, scan lines. Verde glow as signal indicator.
expression.NAVIGATION: Era detection, trajectory projection. Finding position in financial topology.
expression.GRADIENT: Risk spectrums, alignment percentages, confidence intervals.

resonatesWith.translationNotes: Verde/green is the signal emerging. Warm blacks, not cold. The operator is vigilant, not frantic. Data has rhythm.

particles.behavior: Flow left-to-right like money movement, with trails
particles.meaning: Transactions flowing through the system. Horizontal motion = time progression. Density = activity level. Particles ARE the money moving.

usage.IBM Plex Mono: Body text, data values, transaction details. Dense, terminal-like.

typography.note: Ledger uses IBM Plex Mono for body (not Sans) to maintain terminal character throughout.

SpendingTopology.meaning: Spending clusters as organic formations. Money has shape.

EraDetector.meaning: Pattern recognition across time. Detecting when financial 'weather' changes.

DriftMonitor.meaning: Stated intentions vs. revealed patterns. The gap as continuous measurement.

motion.character: Data flow rhythm. Scan line cadence. Continuous but not frantic.
motion.transitions: Scan-line reveals. Data streams in horizontally.

glitch.note: Scanlines always present. Glitch level 2 is baseline, not exception.
